content: @Eric Wieser, would you be able to summarize the status on this one? It's been on the #queue4 a long time, and I've been ignoring it, but I'm not quite sure where we're up to.
I think Mario had some valid objections to the notation or unexpander I wrote, which I'm happy to trust him on; but haven't had time to apply the suggestions
I'm happy for someone to takeover the PR
